statements: UPDATE waste_info SET quantity = 10 WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
UPDATE waste_info SET location = 'Recycling Center' WHERE waste_type = 'Paper';
UPDATE waste_info SET quantity = 5, location = 'Landfill' WHERE waste_type = 'Metal';
UPDATE waste_info SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND location = 'Recycling Center';
UPDATE waste_info SET quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE location = 'Landfill';
UPDATE waste_info SET quantity = quantity * 2 WHERE waste_type = 'Paper';
UPDATE waste_types SET waste_type_name = 'Plastic Bottles' WHERE waste_type_id = 1;
UPDATE waste_info SET quantity = 100.5 WHERE waste_info_id = 1;

UPDATE waste_info SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE waste_type_id = 2 AND collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE waste_info SET location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'Recycling Center') WHERE waste_type_id = 3;
UPDATE WasteTypes SET waste_type_name = 'Organic Waste' WHERE waste_type_id = 1;
